content: bendigo woollen mills yarn requirements x 200g balls pptt 88554422 you will need 1 ball of 10 ply cotton for each bag you should have enough cotton left over to make a stripy bag like the one pictured 1100 ppllyy accessories a 4 50mm & 5 00mm crochet hook ccoottttoonn abbreviations beg = beginning chain = chain double_crochet = double_crochet dtr = double treble_crochet half_double_crochet = half treble_crochet patt = pattern repeat = repeat slip_stitch = slip_stitch space = space st/s = stitch/es treble_crochet = treble_crochet bag base for all bags using 4 50mm hook make 3ch and join with a slip_stitch in first chain to form a ring 1st round ch2 counts as 1st treble_crochet 11tr into centre of ring slip_stitch into 1st treble_crochet 12 sts 2nd round ch2 counts as 1st treble_crochet 2tr in each st to end join to top of 1st treble_crochet 24 sts 3rd round ch2 counts as 1st treble_crochet *2tr in next treble_crochet 1 treble_crochet in next treble_crochet repeat from * to last st 2tr in last st join to 1st treble_crochet 36 sts 4th round ch2 counts as 1st treble_crochet treble_crochet in same st *1tr in next 2 sts 2tr in next st repeat from* to last 2 sts treble_crochet in last 2 sts join to 1st treble_crochet 48 sts 44 5th round chain 2 counts as 1st treble_crochet treble_crochet in same st 1tr in next 3 sts *2tr in next st treble_crochet in next 3 sts repeat from * end join to 1st treble_crochet 60 sts 22 bag strap for all bags change to 4 50mm hook next row double_crochet across next 13 half_double_crochet turn 33 next row double_crochet 13 sts 11 repeat last row until strap measures approx 40cm long from beg or length desired 22 remember the strap will stretch fasten_off and join strap end to opposite side of bag to make up weave in ends * unlike crocheting a garment a gauge measurement is not crucial when making these market bags market bag 1 - snow market bag 2 - glacier and stripe market bag 3 - pink rose market bag 4 - arctic make bag base back page make bag base back page make bag base back page make bag base back page change to 5 00mm hook change to 5 00mm hook change to 5 00mm hook change to 5 00mm hook 1st round ch3 counts as 1st treble_crochet and 1st round ch3 counts as 1st treble_crochet and 1st round ch5 dtr in same st *miss 1 1st round ch3 counts as first treble_crochet and chain 1 *treble_crochet ch1 repeat from * to end join to ch1 1tr 1ch in each st to end join to st dtr ch1 dtr in next st repeat from * to 1ch *1tr 1ch into each st repeat from * to 2nd chain 1st treble_crochet end join in 4th chain of beg ch5 end join to 1st treble_crochet 2nd round ch7 *miss next treble_crochet dtr 2nd round ch3 counts as 1st
